table_entries.entry: **Is racist against Elves.** It will attack a randomly chosen elf in the party, or whoever looks most like an elf.
**Is racist against Dwarves.** It will attack a randomly chosen dwarf in the party, or whoever looks most like a dwarf.
**Is afraid of monsters.** It will attack any randomly chosen tiefling, dragonborn, or other monster-like race in the party.
**Thinks humans are the real monsters.** It will attack any randomly chosen human in the party, or whoever looks most humanlike.
**Is attracted to bright colors.** It will attack whoever is the most flamboyantly dressed.
**Is enraged by the color red.** It will attack whoever is wearing the most red (including red skin and tattoos).
**Is easily distracted by shiny objects.** It will attack whoever is wearing/carrying the most precious metal, gems, or other shiny material.
**Is a slut-shamer.** It will attack whoever is showing the most exposed skin.
**Can’t stand the trends of this generation.** It will attack whoever has the most tattoos and/or piercings.
**Is in a blind panic.** Roll randomly to decide who it attacks each turn.
**Has a vicious bloodlust.** Roll randomly to decide who it attacks first, and it will not stop attacking until they are dead.
**Has a thirst for revenge.** It will attack the first person who makes an attack against it and won't stop attacking until they are dead.
**Has a short-term memory.** It will attack the last person who made an attack against it, whether it hits or misses.
**Wants the pain to stop.** It will attack whoever has dealt the most damage to it during the battle.
**Hates/fears magic.** Will attack anybody it sees using a spell, focusing on whoever is closest.
**Has tunnel vision.** Will attack whoever is closest to it.
**Is nearsighted.** Will only attack melee opponents, and seems to not understand where ranged attacks are coming from.
**Has trouble seeing up close.** Will try to move away from melee attackers, and prefers to attack ranged opponents.
**Knows how to cripple a party.** Will attack anyone it sees using a healing spell, and won't let up until they are dead.
**Can smell blood.** It will attack whoever in the group has the lowest current HP.
**Can’t smell enough blood.** It will attack whoever in the group has the highest current HP.
**Can sense easy prey.** It will attack whoever in the group has the lowest max HP.
**Recognizes easy targets.** It will attack whoever in the group has the lowest AC.
**Enjoys a challenge.** It will attack whoever in the group looks the most dangerous/threatening.
**Recognizes that the bigger they are, the harder they fall.** It will attack whoever is physically the largest.
**Laughs at its puny opponents.** It will attack whoever is physically the smallest.
**Thinks it can destroy the tank.** It will attack whoever has the highest AC.
**Gives up too easily.** It will attack whoever is closest, but will switch to the next closest target if its attack misses.
**Is misogynistic.** It will attack the closest female character.
**Is misandristic.** It will attack the closest male character.
**Fears what it doesn’t understand.** It will attack the most androgynous-looking character, who can’t be identified as male or female.
**Is extremely far-sighted.** It will charge at whoever in the group is furthest away.
**Goes after slow targets.** It will attack whoever in the group is last in the initiative order.
**Makes a snap judgment.** It will attack whoever in the group moves first.
**Is threatened by fast movements.** It will attack whoever in the group moved the furthest distance in the last round.
**Can’t keep track of moving targets.** It will attack anybody who stands still during their turn.
**Believes in the power of teamwork.** It will only attack party members who are already being attacked by one of its allies.
**Fears fire.** It will attack whoever uses a fire-based attack, or is carrying a torch or other exposed flame.
**Is extremely jealous of beauty.** It will attack whoever in the party is the most beautiful, attempting to scar them.
**Wants to beautify the world.** It will attack whoever in the party is the most ugly.
**Has a sensitive nose.** It will attack whoever in the party smells the worst.
**Can’t stand the smell of alcohol.** It will attack whoever was most recently drunk.
**Is startled by loud voices.** It will attack whoever talks/yells the loudest.
**Distrusts those who keep quiet.** It will attack whichever character spoke the least this round.
**Had a cruel ex-lover with long, beautiful hair.** It will attack whichever character has the longest hair.
**Is a tool for the DM to pettily enforce their table rules.** It will attack whichever player (in real life) last looked at their phone or computer.
**Was a high school bully who never grew out of it.** It will attack whoever has high Intelligence and low Strength, or seems the most ‘nerdy’.
**Was bullied as a child and is resentful.** It will attack whoever has low Intelligence and high Strength, or seems the most like a dumb jock.
**Thinks it’s unnatural and wrong for people to fly.** It will attack whoever flies in the air (or just jumps really high).
**Is afraid of sharp objects.** It will move away from anybody brandishing a sword or axe, and will prefer to attack enemies carrying blunt weapons.

title: Who will the enemy attack first and why? (d50, could use help expanding to d100)
